analysis_racial: This job posting subtly discourages candidates from certain racial groups by emphasizing the need to "fit in with our workforce," which implies a preference for candidates who conform to existing team demographics.
text:
Company Background:  
Duran LLC is a leading innovator in the industrial IoT space, specializing in wireless solutions. Our cutting-edge technology serves various industries, and we pride ourselves on a tight-knit, collaborative work environment.

Job Type:  
Full-time, Permanent

Job Description:  
The Product Manager for Industrial IoT Wireless will oversee the development and implementation of our wireless product line. The role involves close collaboration with engineering, marketing, and sales teams to ensure our products meet market demands and set industry standards.

Responsibilities:  
- Lead product strategy and roadmap for industrial IoT wireless products.
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure timely product delivery.
- Conduct market research to identify new opportunities and enhancements.
- Manage product lifecycle from concept to launch.
- Prepare and present product updates to stakeholders.

Qualifications and Experience Needed:  
- Bachelor’s degree in engineering, computer science, or a related field.
- Minimum 5 years of experience in product management, preferably in IoT or wireless technology.
- Must be able to fit in with our workforce.
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
- Excellent communication and presentation abilities.
- Experience working in an international environment is a plus.

Perks and Benefits:  
- Competitive salary and bonus structure.
- Comprehensive health and dental insurance.
- Opportunities for professional growth and development.
- Flexible work schedule and remote work options.
- Inclusive and collaborative work culture.
